body_html:
Ok. Now I have dumped the Node*. It is:

Node {name:'const2' id:2 op device:{} def:{const2 = Const[dtype=DT_FLOAT, value=Tensor<type: float shape: [] values: 2>, _device="/device:CPU:0"]()}}

This shows that the 'op device' is {}, meaning there is no assigned device, but the NodeDef has _device set correctly. I shall see if I can find out where one is assigned to the other (if this is what happens at all)
body:
Ok.  Now I have dumped the Node*.  It is:

```
Node {name:'const2' id:2 op device:{} def:{const2 = Const[dtype=DT_FLOAT, value=Tensor<type: float shape: [] values: 2>, _device="/device:CPU:0"]()}}
```

This shows that the 'op device' is {}, meaning there is no assigned device, but the NodeDef has _device set correctly.  I shall see if I can find out where one is assigned to the other (if this is what happens at all)
